page.title: 15TOURISM.
page.content: {Whitsand Bay Park.}100 static vans,81 tourist vans.Tent site.Shop,Club,Games room and swimming pool.Open from April to October. In our area we have 5 beaches,on which there are 3 cafes.Eddystone Cafe,at the bottom of Tregonhawke Cliff. Clifftop Cafe,at the top of Tregonhawke Cliff,Rame View Cafe,at the top of Happy Valley Cliff. {Maker Camp.}Run by Devon Education Committee.Is open 5 months a year.Can take 200 children and 25 teachers.It is used by groups from London and Wales during holiday periods for educational field studies. {Guest Houses.}Venton House accommodation for 6 guests,average 600 guests per year,Winter and Summer.British,Americans,Canadians,New Zealanders and Europeans.
